```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
country = read.csv("Country.csv")
head(country, 3)
```

```{r}
ind = read.csv("Indicators.csv")
head(ind, 300)
```

```{r}
ind %>%
  filter(CountryCode %in% countries$Alpha.3.code) %>% 
  group_by(CountryName) %>% 
  summarise(
    n = n()
  )
  
```

```{r}
ind %>%
  group_by(IndicatorCode) %>%
  summarize(indicator_name = IndicatorName,
            n = n())
```

```{r}
countries <- read.csv("wikipedia-iso-country-codes.csv")
countries
```
